altTitles.ja: 僕に殺されろ

description.en: Yuu Yakushimaru, a truant junior high school student, spends his days hating his bullying classmates and sarcastic life guidance teachers, and dreaming of one day killing them all. When he gains the "power to kill" and discovers that the people he hates are monsters that he can "kill" - the killing spree will never stop!　Non-stop horror suspense, the curtain rises!

altTitles.ja: カナン様はあくまでチョロい

altTitles.vi: Ác quỷ Kanan dễ đối phó thật đấy

description.en:
Kanan is a demon hiding in a high school in the human world to feed on the souls of humans. She sets her sights on a single high school boy, but somehow ends up in a lovers contract with him!? Kanan, who has never been in love, is now filled with new feelings!

The romantic comedy of a pure-hearted demon's first love, begins!

(Source: Shounen Magazine, translated)
description.ja: 人間の魂を喰らうべく、人間界の高校に潜伏する女悪魔・カナン。一人の男子高校生に狙いを定めるが、気づけばなぜか恋人契約を結ぶことに！？ しかし恋なんてしたことのないカナンには、未知な感情ばかりで…！ 甘酸っぱい青春とギャグの嵐！！
description.tr: Kanan, ruhları sömürmek adına liseye sızan dişi bir iblis. Erkek bir öğrenciyi avı olarak seçer ancak... her nasıl oluyorsa ardından kız arkadaşı olmayı kabul eder!? Daha önce aşkı hiç tatmamış olan Kanan, bilinmedik duygularla dolup taşıyor! Saf kalpli iblisimizin ilk aşkını anlatan sevimli romantik komedi başlıyor!
description.vi: Kanan là một con quỷ ẩn náu trong một trường trung học ở thế giới loài người để ăn linh hồn của con người. Cô ấy để ý đến một nam sinh trung học duy nhất, nhưng bằng cách nào đó lại kết thúc với một hợp đồng tình nhân với anh ta !? Kanan, người chưa từng yêu, giờ đang tràn ngập cảm xúc mới! Bộ truyện hài lãng mạn về mối tình đầu của một con quỷ có trái tim thuần khiết, bắt đầu!
description.pt-br: Kanan é uma demônio que se esconde em uma escola secundária no mundo humano para se alimentar de almas humanas. Ela põe em sua mira em um dos alunos da escola mas de alguma forma acaba assinando um contrato de amante com ele! Mas Kanan que nunca esteve apaixonada antes, está cheia de emoções desconhecidas…! Começa uma comédia romântica do primeiro amor de uma Demônio!

description.en: Na Kang Lim, a high school student who enjoys reading webtoons, experiences a strange event one day when the female lead from his favorite webtoon appears before him. Even more surprising, the same incidents that put her in danger in the webtoon start happening in real life. The problem is, there's no protagonist in the real world to save her! Ultimately, Na Kang Lim takes on the role of the protagonist, looping through time to save her.

altTitles.ja: 拳精
鉄拳チンミ

description.en:
In ancient China a young fighter named Chinmi goes to the Dairin temple for advanced training. He eventually must leave Dairin temple to go on a pilgrimage where he meets many challenges to test his skills.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Kung Fu Boy** (1991: tankoubon, 2011: bunko)

---

- **Won the 11th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 1987**

altTitles.vi: Tối Cường Phản Sáo Lộ Hệ Thống

description.en:
Scamming all day, every day, often venturing alone. He bluffs to get the ultimate power in this cultivation world?! world traveler Xue Que doesn’t always bluff, but he needs to.  
  
"Before you get your hopes up, The Character is Absolute Garbage, The Manhua is Pure comedy at best… The plot ehhh not so much"  
  
Term : META Stands for (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming is any strategy, action or method used in a game which transcends a prescribed ruleset, uses external factors to affect the game, or goes beyond the supposed limits or environment set by the game. Another definition refers to the game universe outside of the game itself. *(citation needed)*
description.fr:
Escroquer toute la journée, tous les jours, souvent en s'aventurant seul. Il bluffe pour obtenir le pouvoir ultime dans ce monde de culture ! Le voyageur du monde Xue Que ne bluffe pas toujours, mais il en a besoin.

Terme : META signifie (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming est la stratégie, l'action ou la méthode utilisée dans un jeu qui transcende un ensemble de règles prescrit, utilise des facteurs externes pour affecter le jeu, ou va au-delà des limites supposées ou l'environnement établi par le jeu. Une autre définition fait référence à l'univers du jeu en dehors du jeu lui-même.

description.en:
"It seems like I'd like someone like you."

"You're really like a little pony." 

This is a slice-of-life of the romance and exploits of an adorkable and ditzy senior "little fox" and her dependable junior "little pony".
description.uk: "Здається, мені б сподобався хтось на кшталт тебе". "Ти справді як маленьке поні". Буденність про романтику та подвиги чарівної й навіженої Старшої "лисички" та її надійної Молодшої "поні".
description.zh: “我好像会喜欢你这样的人。” “你好像一匹小马。” 呆萌跳脱年上“小狐狸”和她的靠谱 “年下小马驹”的爱情事业双丰收日常 。

description.en: His fiancee lost her parents so she will be living with the Hyeons, but Sang-Won is a middle school student and the fiancée is a 24 year old adult!? Sang-Won tries to deny that his fiancée is 9 years older than him, but seeing that she does not act her age, he then feels comfortable around her. His fiancée seems kind and innocent on the outside, but on the inside…

altTitles.ja: 龍鎖のオリ　―心の中の“こころ”―

altTitles.ja-ro: Ryuusa no Ori: Kokoro no Naka no "Kokoro"

altTitles.en: Ori of the Dragon Chain - "Heart" in the Mind

description.en:
The Solminati Academy is a prestigious school that harbors the dreams and hopes of ambitious students. Our story resolves a young man named Nozomu Bountis who entered the school for his lover's dream. As time went on, his powers deadlocked and could no longer advance, and his grades fell. Eventually, his lover was stolen by his at-the-time best friend. Heartbroken and lost on what to do next, he focused even harder on his training. Eventually, he meets an Old woman, who triggers the catalyst to his growth. The future is uncertain but gradually, his world changes.  
  
  
  
  
[Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7408y/)
description.id: Akademi solminati adalah sekolah bergengsi yang menampung impian dan harapan siswa yang ambisius. Kisah kami menyelesaikan seorang pemuda bernama Nozomu Bountis yang masuk sekolah untuk impian kekasihnya. Seiring berjalannya waktu, kekuatannya menemui jalan buntu dan tidak bisa lagi maju, dan nilainya turun. Akhirnya, kekasihnya dicuri oleh sahabatnya saat itu. Patah hati dan kehilangan apa yang harus dilakukan selanjutnya, dia lebih fokus pada pelatihannya. Akhirnya, dia bertemu dengan seorang wanita tua, yang memicu katalis untuk pertumbuhannya. Masa depan tidak pasti tetapi secara bertahap, dunianya berubah.
description.ja:
精霊が棲まう世界で、剣や魔法、気術を競い合うソルミナティ学園。
実力主義のこの学園で、力が向上しないアビリティ「能力抑制」を
授かってしまったノゾム・バウンティスは、幼馴染や恋人さえも失い、
希望が見えない日々を過ごしていたが……!?

altTitles.ja: ワイルドアダプター

description.en: Makoto Kubota wandered through life, not taking things too seriously or looking too deep within himself. His job as the head of the Izumo Group's youth gang kept him pleasantly occupied with yakuza wars, mahjong and assassinations… Until the day he stumbled upon a strange drug called Wild Adapter that produces bizarre side-effects–including death. Forever changed, Kubota becomes entangled with a drifter named Minoru Tokito, and the two form an unlikely companionship that draws them deeper into the mystery of Wild Adapter…

altTitles.ja: 尾守つみきと奇日常。

altTitles.en: Tsumiki Ogami & the Strange Everyday Life.

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.pt-br: Tsumiki Ogami e seu estranho coditiano.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

altTitles.ru: Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.

altTitles.ja: 愛重くんは病んでいる。

description.en: One day, Ichigotani Nanako receives a sudden confession from Agasa Yuki, the genius prince at school who's also her junior in her club. Surprised by this, the natural airhead Nanako blurts out, "I''ll be in trouble if you die though!" and ends up dating Agasa-kun. Anyway, Agasa-kun has an extraordinary obsession and possessiveness, and he has no mercy for any bugs that come near Nanako!
description.ja: ある日突然、部活の後輩で学校一の秀才プリンスである愛重由希に告白された苺谷奈々子。いきなりの告白に驚きながらも、天然な奈々子は「死なれたら困る！」と愛重くんと付き合うことに。とにかく愛が重い愛重くんは、執着の仕方も独占欲も異常で、奈々子に近づく悪い虫には容赦なし!!

altTitles.ja: 魔法世界の ジュン

altTitles.en: Fairy Tale Manga Magical World Jun

description.en:
Jun of Ishinomori's Fantasy World Jun returns, this time as a younger boy. While he may be younger, the sights he sees are as fantastic as ever, taking one on trips throughout different worlds as he tries to make sense of things.

Serialized in two magazines, including Sanrio's shojo magazine Lyrica.

altTitles.ja: 악마를 배불리는 법

description.en: Did our runt Vanessa Blake encounter another god because yours abandoned you? May we, the lord of evil Belzebuth, tell you something interesting? Most humans seek your god when they end up meeting us. They seem to think their lord will save them and seeing their desperation never fails to make us laugh. That is because their god is just our other half. You may see your many reincarnations as a sign of your god’s disdain, but we feel you are beloved. Thus, we shall give you whatever you desire.
description.pl:
Kolejne żmudne życie zaczęło się od nowa.
Czy mi się to podoba, czy nie, będę się reinkarnowała wraz z moimi wspomnieniami.
Zgadza się, jestem osobą która ciągle się reinkarnuje.
Diabeł pojawił się przede mną, który został wezwany po moim 29 życiu.
"Czy to ty mnie wzywałaś?"
Były czasy, kiedy wiernie służyłam Bogu w moich poprzednich wcieleniach. A jednak jedyną nagrodą, jaką od Niego otrzymałam, była śmierć moich bliskich.
Nie będę już dłużej trzymała się Boga.
"Och diable, proszę, zabierz moje koszmary. Zawrzyj ze mną układ".

By: ficpon and Enn

description.en: Yilin bumps into the tomboy Rouxi, sparking an interest between each other that slowly blooms.
description.pt-br: Yilin esbarra na tomboy Rouxi, despertando um interesse entre elas que floresce lentamente.

title.en: Smoking Behind the Supermarket with You

altTitles.ja: スーパーの裏でヤニ吸うふたり

altTitles.id: Cerita Tentang Merokok di Belakang Supermarket

altTitles.es-la: Historias que ocurren al fumar en la parte trasera del supermercado

altTitles.pt-br: Uma história sobre fumar no fundo de um mercadinho

altTitles.zh-hk: 在超市後門吸菸的二人

altTitles.en: A Story About Smoking at the Back of the Supermarket
Behind the Supermarket, Smoking With You

altTitles.ja-ro: Super no Ura de Yani Suu Futari

altTitles.fr: Fumer en bonne compagnie à l'arrière de la supérette
Deux fumeurs à l'arrière de la supérette

description.en:
Sasaki, an overworked salaryman, goes through an average stressful day just for a single light at the end of the tunnel: Yamada, the always-cheerful clerk at his favorite convenience store. 

One day, Sasaki takes an extra amount of time at a company meeting, and by the time he gets to the convenience store Yamada has already clocked out. However, as he leaves, he notices a young woman with piercings smoking behind the store?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Manga UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/261)
description.ru:
Сасаки, переутомлённый служащий, каждый раз проживает обычный напряжённый день ради единственного света в конце туннеля: Ямада, жизнерадостная продавщица в его любимом магазинчике.
В один день, Сасаки задержался на работе и когда он возвращался домой через магазинчик, смена Ямады давно закончилась. Однако, когда он вышел, то заметил молодую женщину с пирсингом курящую за магазином.
description.vi: Sasaki - một người đàn ông làm công ăn lương, vượt qua những ngày làm việc mệt nhoài nhờ có tia sáng nơi cuối đường hầm: Yamada - nhân viên bán hàng luôn vui tươi tại siêu thị tiện lợi yêu thích của anh. Một ngày nọ, Sasaki phải ở lại công ty đến muộn vì một cuộc họp nên khi đến cửa hàng, Yamada đã hết giờ làm việc. Tuy nhiên, khi sắp rời đi, anh để ý thấy một cô gái trẻ đeo những chiếc khuyên xỏ đang ngồi hút thuốc phía sau cửa hàng…
description.es-la: Sasaki, un asalariado con exceso de trabajo, pasa por un día estresante promedio solo por una sola luz al final del túnel: Yamada, la siempre alegre empleada de su tienda de conveniencia favorita. Un día, Sasaki se toma una cantidad extra de tiempo en una reunión de la empresa, y cuando llega a la tienda de conveniencia, Yamada ya se había marchado. Sin embargo, cuando se va, se da cuenta de que una mujer joven con piercings fuma detrás de la tienda......
description.pt-br:
Sasaki, um assalariado sobrecarregado, passa por um dia estressante comum apenas por uma única luz no fim do túnel: Yamada, o sempre alegre balconista de sua loja de conveniência favorita.

Um dia, Sasaki leva um tempo extra em uma reunião da empresa e, quando chega à loja de conveniência, Yamada já bateu o ponto. No entanto, ao sair, ele percebe uma jovem com piercings fumando atrás da loja. O que vai se desenrolar?

title.en: Hajime no Ippo - The First Step

altTitles.th: ก้าวแรกสู่สังเวียน

altTitles.ja: はじめの一歩

description.en:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)
description.pt-br: Ippo Makunouchi, um tímido estudante de ensino médio, é um dia salvo se der espancado, por Takamura, um boxeador. Encantado pelas habilidade de Takamura e por vídeos de boxe, Ippo decide enfrentar o mundo profissional do boxe!

altTitles.zh-hk: 靈甲鬼修羅 - 避邪回歸

description.en: "On the beautiful Jeju Island, MiHo Won, a beautiful teacher, and Van, a cold and mysterious guy, become entangled in strange events, fighting unknown monsters. A legend of exorcism comics is back as webtoon!"

altTitles.vi: Chàng Rể Mạnh Nhất Lịch Sử

description.en:
Shen Lang traveled to the past and became a matrilocal son-in-law of a wealthy family. And yet he was kicked out for being a good-for-nothing. So he swore that he would marry a more powerful and striking noblewoman.

I'm not going to practice martial arts in my whole life! I'll groom my wife to be the No.1 martial master in the world! She will kick the ass of anyone who dares to mess with me!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Bilibili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32611)
description.pt-br: Sheng lang foi expulso de casa por ser um desperdício de comida e oxigênio, coisas aconteceram e ele acabou em outro mundo, para sobreviver nesse novo mundo ele precisa aprender artes marciais mas como ele é muito preguiçoso e fraco ele concluiu que sua melhor opção é encontrar uma esposa bonita, rica e talentosa e ser apenas um marido troféu que passa seus dias aproveitando as riquezas da vida!! E se alguém se atreve a perturbar sua paz, ele vai dizer a sua esposa para chutar seus traseiros!!!

altTitles.ja: モンスターシュタイン

description.en:
A few decades back, humanity went to war against strange beings such as werewolves and witches, and was on the verge of defeat.

The solution to breaking this deadlock was the human weapon created by Dr. Frankenstein. Time passes, and Vic, a mysterious girl, is traveling with Stein, a large man covered in scars.

All in order to destroy the distorted principles of this world.
description.ja: 十数年前、人狼や魔女など異形の存在との戦争に挑んだ人類は敗北の危機を迎える。その局面を打開したのはフランケンシュタイン博士が生み出した人間兵器――。時は流れ、謎多き少女ヴィクは、傷だらけの大男シュタインと旅をしていた。すべてはこの世界の歪んだ理を破壊するために。

altTitles.ja: かわいい彼女ちゃん

description.en: A cute girl came knocking at the protagonist's door, but for what reason may it be.
description.ru: Милая девушка постучалась в дверь главного героя, но по какой причине это вообще произошло?
description.vi: Một cô gái dễ thương gõ cửa nhà tôi, còn để làm gì thì tôi không biết.
description.pt-br: Uma linda garota veio bater à porta do protagonista, mas por que razão?

altTitles.ja: スマイリー

description.en: Yuushi Kamome is a freelance writer who lost his beloved daughter in an accident. In despair, his wife leaves him, and he spends his days like a shell of a man. One day, however, a flyer from a strange religious group, the "Heart Laughing Society," changes his fate. It shows the image of his wife, whom he has lost touch with...This is a story of faith and madness. What is the black darkness of the cult that an evil smile invites? A chilling “new religion” suspense begins!
description.ru:
Томодзи Камомэ — писатель-фрилансер, потерявший любимую дочь в результате несчастного случая. В отчаянии от него уходит жена, и он проводит свои дни в одиночестве, закрывшись от внешнего мира.
Однако однажды листовка странной религиозной группы «Общество смеющегося сердца» меняет его судьбу. В ней он увидел свою жену, с которой потерял связь...

title.en: The Useless Genie and her Intrusive-thought Master
Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

title.en: Touhou - Until the Water Became Wholly Red (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 池水尽く紅
いけみずこくごとくあか

description.en:
Youkai Mountain, Gensokyo. Even within this closed-off world, the tengu have their own closed-off, multilayered society. All Shameimaru Aya wants is to work on the scoop of a lifetime, but all around her, much more complicated schemes are afoot, and it seems they can't help but get in her way.

Long-running doujin series by Ashiyama, author of "The Gensokyo of Humans" and "The Magician Who Loved a Fake". Published in book form and for free on Pixiv.

altTitles.ja: 忘却バッテリー

description.en: Geniuses who made a name for themselves in middle school baseball but have been away from baseball accidentally come together at an obscure metropolitan high school. Haruka Kiyomine is a pitcher with an unbeatable arm. His partner, the shrewd catcher, Kei Kaname, is now an amateur due to amnesia!. And then there are the two of them. And those who were defeated and scattered by the two in the past… The story of their high school baseball game is about to begin again!

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンボール角明

description.en: The story in Dragon Ball Kakumei picks up right after the Tournament of Power and deals with the consequences of Android 17 restoring the erased universes. In addition to the six universes destroyed by Zeno, the wish brought back Universe 19, which has warriors that are powerful enough to take down Zeno and the angels.
description.pt-br:
“Quando o desejo do Androide 17 no final do Torneio do Poder leva o mundo a uma Guerra Multiversal, aliados de todos os universos terão que se fortalecer para enfrentar divindades malignas e, desta vez, eles terão que defender todos sem Goku”.

Criado pelos franceses Darkows (roteiro), Reenko (roteiro) e Poissonlabo (desenhista), Dragon Ball Kakumei é um mangá não oficial que conta uma história alternativa se caso o desejo do Androide 17, ao fim do Torneio do Poder, restaurasse os 18 universos que existiam originalmente, levando a uma Guerra Multiversal entre grandes divindades, mas sem a presença de Son Goku.

Com uma arte atípica, em se tratando de um mangá feito por fãs (que geralmente costumam tentar emular os traços de Akira Toriyama), além de uma história com uma narrativa e proposta bem diferente da leveza e simplicidade da obra original, Dragon Ball Kakumei é, sem dúvidas, um dos mangás não oficiais de Dragon Ball mais famosos, ao lado de outros projetos de fãs como Dragon Ball AF e Dragon Ball Multiverse.

altTitles.ja: キッチンのお姫さま

description.en: Najika is a great cook and likes to make meals for the people she loves. But something is missing from her life. When she was a child, she met a boy who touched her heart–and now Najika is determined to find him. The only clue she has is a silver spoon that leads her to the prestigious Seika Academy. At Seika she meets two brothers Daichi and Sora, could one of them be the boy from her childhood?

altTitles.ja: それでも世界は美しい

altTitles.en: Even So, the World Is Still Beautiful

altTitles.fr: Néanmoins, le monde est beau encore

altTitles.pt-br: Ainda assim, o mundo é belo

altTitles.es: Aun así, el mundo es hermoso

altTitles.th: รักสองอาณาจักรที่ปลายฝน

altTitles.zh-hk: 儘管如此世界依然美麗

altTitles.zh: 尽管如此世界依然美丽

description.en: Nike is the fourth princess of the Rain Dukedom and one who holds the power to call forth the rain. Despite her own reluctance, for the sake of her country she travels to the Sun Kingdom to marry Sun King Livius. She soon discovers that the King, who conquered the world within only three years of ascending to the throne, is actually… a child?! Furthermore, for trivial reasons, he demands that Nike call forth the rain…?!

altTitles.ja: 高嶺と花
타카네와 하나

description.en: When Hana replaces her sister at an omiai (like a goukon, but for marriage) little does she expect to be insulted and called a gold digger by the handsome and older Takane! Furious, she throws her wig in his face and leaves. Unexpectedly she gets asked out on a date by Takane the next day. How will these two ever find love?
description.pl: Kiedy Hana zastąpiła swoją siostrę na spotkaniu aranżującym małżeństwo, nie przypuszczała, że zostanie nazwana deską i całkiem zwyczajną dziewczyną przez przystojnego i starszego Takane! W złości rzuca w niego swoją perukę. Następnego dnia zostaje niespodziewanie zaproszona na randkę przez Takane. Czy ta dwójka kiedykolwiek znajdzie miłość?

altTitles.ja: 休憩中のコンカフェ嬢
コンカフェ嬢

description.en: [Pixiv - Alternate Official Raw](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/105508310) (Has background-less variation + illustrations)

title.en: My Daughter Is the Final Boss

altTitles.fr: Ma fille est le boss final

altTitles.it: Mia figlia è il boss finale

altTitles.ja: 俺の娘はラスボス

altTitles.zh: 我的女儿是最终的老板

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的女兒是最終的老闆

description.en:
Lee Seojun could only watch as his daughter, the witch Lee Seola, turned into the wicked final boss who destroyed the world and brought upon his death. Though never a good dad, as he loses consciousness, Seojun gets a new quest: "Change the Future." Upon awakening, he sees a 5-year-old Seola standing before him. Now, Seojun must raise Seola to avoid the misfortunes that originally turned her wicked and become the caring father she never had. The price of failure? Only the end of the world.

---
My daughter destroyed the world. At the end of the divergence, I died helplessly. When I opened my eyes again, my five-year-old daughter was in front of me.

*Unique Quest: Changing the Future*
Stop Seol-ah Lee's five misfortunes. (0/5) 

I was given another chance. If I raised her incorrectly, the world will perish.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%B4-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%80-%EC%B5%9C%EC%A2%85-%EB%B3%B4%EC%8A%A4/2964), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59097539)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/my-daughter-is-the-final-boss/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16387)
* [French / Français](https://piccoma.com/fr/product/441)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/115453)
description.fr:
Ma fille a détruit le monde. À la fin de celui-ci, je suis mort impuissant. Quand j'ai rouvert les yeux, ma fille de cinq ans était devant moi. <Quête unique : Changer le futur> Arrêtez les cinq malheurs de Seol-Ah Lee. (0/5) Une nouvelle chance m'a été accordée. Si elle est mal éduquée, le monde périra.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%B4-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%80-%EC%B5%9C%EC%A2%85-%EB%B3%B4%EC%8A%A4/2964), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59097539)

* [French / Français](https://piccoma.com/fr/product/441)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/115453)
description.id:
Putriku menghancurkan dunia ini, di akhir hidupku aku mati tidak berdaya. Ketika aku membuka mata, putriku yang berusia 5 tahun berada di hadapanku. Aku mengalami regresi dan harus mencegah 5 nasib buruk Seol-Ah (0/5) Aku diberikan kesempatan sekali lagi, untuk mengubah semuanya dan menebus semua kesalahanku di masa lalu Jika dibiarkan begitu saja, maka dunia akan binasa. - Diary Lee Seojun

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%B4-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%80-%EC%B5%9C%EC%A2%85-%EB%B3%B4%EC%8A%A4/2964), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59097539)

description.ko:
내 딸이 세상을 멸망시켰다.
엇나감의 끝에서, 나는 무력하게 죽음을 맞이했다.
다시 눈을 떴을 때, 내 눈앞에는 다섯 살의 딸이 있었다.

<고유 퀘스트 : 미래 바꾸기>
이설아의 다섯 가지 불행을 막으십시오.(0/5)

다시 한번 주어진 기회.
잘못 키우면, 세상이 멸망한다.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%B4-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%80-%EC%B5%9C%EC%A2%85-%EB%B3%B4%EC%8A%A4/2964), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59097539)

description.ru:
Моя дочь разрушила мир. В конце её дивергенции я беспомощно умер.
Когда снова открыл глаза, передо мной стояла моя пятилетняя дочь.
[Остановите пять несчастий Соль-а Ли. (0/5)]
Мне дали ещё один шанс. Если её неправильно воспитать, то мир погибнет.

description.uk:
Моя донька зруйнувала світ, а я помер. Але після смерті перед моїми очима з'явилось завдання.

---

description.zh:
我的女儿灭亡了世界。 就在生死毁灭之际，我无力的迎接死亡的到来。 再次睁开双眼的时候，我回到了过去，眼前竟出现了女儿5岁时的身影！

title.en: I Became the Only Healer in This World

altTitles.ru: Я стала единственным хилером в этом мире

altTitles.ja: この世界で唯一のヒーラーになりました

description.ru:
Девушка, играющая за хилера на протяжении многих лет, так и не смогла ничего достичь. Однажды, невероятным образом она переместилась в другой мир, в котором не оказалось ни одного хилера.  
— Есть пати, которое хочет пригласить вас, невероятного и неповторимого хилера. Вы ответите на призыв?  
"А? У них есть танки и ДД, но ни одного хилера? У них тут вообще хоть что-то сбалансированно?"  — 
Это не игра, а реальность. И созвездия, защищающие тебя, будут жаловаться тебе на жизнь!    

***  
Врата появились несколько десятилетий назад. За это время накопилось множество тактик и сведений, но...  
— Что за унылые атаки в лоб? Ещё не надоело?  
Из-за очень наивной тактики врата брали напролом.  
— Это вы ведь меня спасли? Лишь благодаря вашим способностями.  
Преданный, скрывающийся бывший первый ранг...  
— О, моя спасительница, не покидай меня.  
...директор ассоциации 10 гильдий...  
— Прошу, не бросай меня. Я не смогу жить без тебя.  
...и даже нынешний первый ранг — каждый был восхищен ею.  
Когда она была занята тактикой прохождения врат, начали появляться странные дети, что совершенно не входило в её планы.

altTitles.ja: 鬼畜英雄

description.en: 10 years since he reincarnated in hell…Takamichi is troubled. With the “Incubus” power unlocking further to become stronger by having sex with women but his growth peaked. “I’ll move to a new area, wait for me beautiful women of the new world!” Sexy & violent pretty girl battle fantasy!
description.pt-br: 10 anos desde que ele reencarnou no inferno ... O herói “Takamichi” está com problemas. Com o poder do “Incubus” de ficar mais forte fazendo sexo com mulheres, ele já não tinha mais inimigos e seu crescimento atingiu o pico. “Vou me mudar para uma nova área, esperem por mim, lindas mulheres do novo mundo!” Fantasia de batalha de menina bonita sexy e violenta!

altTitles.ja: オトメの帝国

description.en: A peek into the "everyday nudity" of high school girls. Virgins’ Empire is a look into the lives of seven high school girls attending an all girls school. We follow them as they grow relationships with one another. Some more intimate than others.

title.en: Otome Game no Mob Desura Naindaga

altTitles.ja: 乙女ゲーのモブですらないんだが

altTitles.ja-ro: Otomege no Mob de Sura Nain da ga
Otomege no Mobu de Sura Nain da ga
Otome Game no Mobu Desura Naindaga

altTitles.en: I'm Not Even an NPC in This Otome Game!

altTitles.ru: Я Не Моб Из Девичьей Отомэ-игры

altTitles.en: I'm Not Even an Otome Game Mob Character

description.en:
Guy reincarnates into the gardening apprentice who works for the rival character of the heroine of an otome game. He doesn't care and just wants to be a gardener.

[Original Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1313ff/)

A man who was reincarnated in another world as a 9th class wizard and retired after saving the continent from a dragon war. He decides to open a small restaurant in the countryside, but his routine is anything but ordinary. On the second floor of his restaurant, there lives a black dragon who has transformed into a woman, named Rurin. She is greedy, cute and loyal to him, but also ignorant and clueless about the human world. They live a fun and warm life, serving customers, solving problems and growing violets in the garden.
description.ko:
요리사를 꿈꾸던 내가 사고로 이세계에 떨어졌다.

몬스터와 마법이 넘쳐나는 판타지 세계이지만 여기라고 식당을 못할 건 없잖아?

그러나 전쟁으로 인해 이세계에 들어오자마자 군대에 끌려가게 되고,
...

title.en: Saki-chan wa Konya mo Peko Peko

altTitles.ja: サキちゃんは今夜もぺこぺこ

description.en: Saki-chan is a beautiful young woman and just a little naive. She may seem harmless as she wanders the streets, but beware–she’s a brand-new succubus who thrives on the lust of men! She’s just…not very good at it yet. When she finds herself with an opportunity to move in with a 30-something man who’s never slept with a woman before, she takes it, just like she’ll take him! Er, eventually. This sweet and sexy comedy about a novice sex demon and her virgin partner will leave you satisfied but always hungry for more.
description.id: Saki adalah gadis yang cantik dan sedikit polos. Dia mungkin tampak tak berbahaya ketika berada di jalan, namun sesungguhnya dia adalah succubus baru yang mencari nafsu laki-laki! Dia… belum bagus dalam hal itu. Akhirnya dia punya kesempatan untuk tinggal bersama laki-laki umur 30-an yang masih perjaka. Ini adalah cerita komedi yang manis dan seksi antara demon seks pemula dan rekan perjakanya yang akan membuatmu puas dan meminta lebih. Dijamin!
description.ja: アパートの前で行き倒れていた巨乳×天然系美少女は、ウブでピュアな新米サキュバスだった！？　彼女は精を吸収しなければならない困った体質で同居することになったオーバー30の童貞男子には、うれしくもキビしー状況に！！

altTitles.vi: Fairy Tail Nhiệm vụ Trăm năm

altTitles.th: แฟรี่เทล ภาคเควส 100 ปี ตอนที่

altTitles.ja: フェアリーテイル １００年クエスト

altTitles.zh-hk: 妖精的尾巴 百年任務

description.en:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.ru: Продолжение популярной манги "Хвост Феи" или "Фейри Тейл", которая будет носить отдельное название "100 летний квест"! После победы над Зерефом нашу любимую, еще более сильную гильдию, ждет новое приключение! Не пропустите новые приключения популярных героев!

altTitles.ja: ブルーロック

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr:
Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

title.en: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daigoshou - Mizu no Miyako to Eiyuu no Uta

altTitles.en: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-, Chapter 5: The City of Water and the Hero's Poem

altTitles.es-la: Re:ZERO - Starting Life in Another World-, Arco 5: La Capital del Agua y El Poema del Héroe.

altTitles.ja: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活　第五章　水の都と英雄の詩

altTitles.pt-br: Re:Zero — Começando uma Vida em Outro Mundo — Arco 5: A Metrópole da Água e o Poema do Herói

altTitles.ru: Re:Zero. Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире. Часть пятая: Звёзды, что творят историю

description.pt-br: Um ano após a batalha no santuário. Natsuki Subaru estava passando um tempo tranquilo, mas tudo mudou quando recebeu um convite de um certo mensageiro. O convite para a cidade portuária de Priestella, que era a carta que Anastasia, uma das candidatas à realeza, enviou para Emilia. Rumo à cidade portuária onde o mal se agita, os heróis veteranos se reúnem. A tão esperada adaptação em manga do Arco 5 de Re:Zero começa!

altTitles.ja: 大怪獣ゲァーチマ

description.en:
The port town of Sukuba was hit by a huge wave caused by a monster that suddenly appeared from the sea. The inactive monster dissolved into the sea and became a rich source of nutrients for fish and shellfish. As a result, Sukuba's economy thrived. The monster started to be called Gaea-Tima, the god of the harvest.

A young girl, Miyako Morino, a victim of the disaster, made a doll of Gaea-Tima, as a memento of the event, which was sold as a souvenir and became a popular item. However, for the first time in 10 years, a monster appears in the reconstructed town of Sukuba...

Is this monster a friend or foe of mankind?
description.ja: 海から突如出現した怪獣と共に起きた大波で、港町・匡波町は被災した。活動を停止した怪獣は、海に溶け魚介類の豊かな栄養素となり、匡波町の経済を潤し、豊穣の神ゲァーチマと呼ばれるようになった。被災者である少女・杜野宮矢子がその出来事を形に遺すべく作ったゲァーチマの人形は、土産物として販売され人気を集めていた。しかし、復興した匡波町に10年ぶりに怪獣が現れ…。怪獣は人類の敵か味方か？

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

title.en: Isshou Hatarakitakunai Ore ga Classmate no Daininki Idol ni Natsukaretara

altTitles.ja: 一生働きたくない俺が、クラスメイトの大人気アイドルに懐かれたら

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng idol đói bụng và anh chàng yêu nội trợ

altTitles.ja-ro: Isshou Hatarakitakunai Ore ga Classmate no Daininki Idol ni Natsukaretara

altTitles.en: A Very Popular Idol Classmate Has Taken a Liking to Me, A Person Who Doesn’t Want to Work for my Whole Life

altTitles.ja-ro: Isshou Hatarakita Kunai Ore ga, Classmate no Daininki Idol ni Idakaretara

altTitles.zh: 班里的人气偶像黏上了一辈子不想工作的我

description.en: Rintaro Shido, a high school student who aspires to become a full-time househusband, is in the class with a very popular idol, Rei Otosaki. The two have no connection other than being classmates, but their relationship changes drastically when Rintaro serves Rei a home-cooked meal after she nearly collapses from hunger! The food was so delicious that Rei said, "Can I come here every day to eat?"...?!
description.ja: 専業主夫を目指す高校生・志藤凛太郎のクラスには、世間でも大人気のアイドル・乙咲玲が在籍していた。同級生であること以外の関係がない二人だったが、空腹で倒れそうになった玲に凛太郎が手料理を振る舞ったことで関係は一変！ あまりの美味しさに玲は「毎日食べに来ていい？」と言ってきて……!?
description.vi: Shido Rintaro, nam sinh cao trung ước ao trở thành một ông chồng nội trợ, học cùng lớp với idol nổi tiếng Otosaki Rei. Cả hai không liên quan gì đến nhau trừ việc học cùng lớp. Đó là cho đến khi Rei xém ngất xỉu vì đói, và được Rintaro nấu ăn cho. Tay nghề cậu ta khá đến nỗi Rei quyết định sẽ đến ăn chực mỗi ngày...!?
description.pt-br: Rintaro Shido, um estudante do ensino médio que aspira se tornar um dono de casa em tempo integral, está na classe de uma idol muito popular, Rei Otosaki. Os dois não têm nenhuma conexão além de serem colegas de classe, mas seu relacionamento muda drasticamente quando Rintaro serve uma refeição caseira para Rei depois que ela quase desmaia de fome! A comida estava tão deliciosa que Rei disse: "Posso vir aqui todos os dias para comer?"...?!

title.en: Salaryman ga Isekai ni Ittara Shitennou ni Natta Hanashi

altTitles.en: Office Worker Has Become "Big Four" in the Different World.

altTitles.ja: サラリーマンが異世界に行ったら四天王になった話

altTitles.en: Headhunted to Another World: From Salaryman to Big Four!

altTitles.tr: Başka Bir Dünyaya Yöneldi: Maaşlı Adamdan Göksel Krala!

description.en: Dennosuke Uchimura is a simple Salaryman who one day is run over, and left in the street to die, however, when he regains consciousness, it seems as though he was summoned to another world by the Demon King himself, who offers him a position as one of his Four Heavenly Kings. Can Dennosuke survive as a servant of the Demon King, and meet his expectations?

altTitles.vi: Bị Che Khuất Bởi Ánh Mặt Trời Lặn
Tà dương trong đôi mắt vô hồn

altTitles.ru: Закат, отражённый в её ледяном взгляде

description.en:
The witch Hildegar, who received the blessing of the Sun Goddess Karia, is known far and wide for her fearsome reputation.  
The Northerner Elkin, who lost his homeland, chases after the witch towards a nameless castle…
description.ko:
태양의 신 카리야의 가호를 받은 마녀 '힐데가르'.
고향을 잃은 북부인 '에르킨'은 마녀를 쫓아 이름 없는 성으로 향한다.

altTitles.ja: がばい -佐賀のがばいばあちゃん-
がばい佐賀のがばいばあちゃん

altTitles.en: The Story of my Wonderful [Gabai] Grandmother

description.en: This is the story of a young boy, after being sent from Hiroshima to Saga (10 years after the second World War, in 1958) by his mom because of a lack of money, journeying to a faraway place, and living in conditions alien to him, definitely makes him miss home. Worse, he is not familiar with his grandmother and her ways too. But with his Gabai Granny, he will slowly discover with his growing pains, just how resourceful Granny is…

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Reijou no Naka no Hito ~Danzai sareta Tenseisha no Tame Usotsuki Heroine ni Fukushuu Itashimasu~

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢の中の人
悪役令嬢の中の人〜断罪された転生者のため嘘つきヒロインに復讐いたします〜

altTitles.zh: 恶役千金的真面目～为被定罪的转生者向骗子女主报复～

altTitles.zh-hk: 惡役千金的真面目～為被定罪的轉生者向騙子女主報復～

altTitles.ja: Akuyaku Reijou no Naka no Hito

altTitles.vi: Kẻ Cư Ngụ Bên Trong Ác Nữ

altTitles.fr: La fille au sein de l'antagoniste
Celle à l'intérieur de la vilaine

description.en:
In order to clear the name of 'Emi,' a girl who had reincarnated as Remilia, the villainess of an otome game, the real Remilia who had been watching all along inside awakens.

Now it's time for the true villainess' revenge to begin!
description.id:
Agar bisa membersihkan nama "Emi", yaitu nama seorang gadis yang bereinkarnasi menjadi Remilia sang villainess dari sebuah game otome, Remilia asli yang selama ini mengawasi emi dari dalam akhirnya telah tersadar.

Sekarang adalah waktunya bagi sang villainess yang asli untuk membalaskan dendamnya!

altTitles.ja: 目黒さんは初めてじゃない

altTitles.vi: Đây không phải lần đầu của Meguro-san

altTitles.zh-ro: Mù hēi tóngxué bìngfēi dì yī cì

description.en:
Third-year high school student Makoto Koga decides to confess to his crush, the school's most beautiful girl, second-year Saki Meguro. To his surprise, she agrees to date him. But what surprises him even more is her following words: "I'm not a virgin."

Unbeknownst to Koga, the surprisingly passive Meguro has the reputation of being the lascivious "easy girl" at school, not rejecting any boy that approaches her and having gone through multiple boyfriends.

Will Koga persevere? Will he fare any differently than the rest?
How will Meguro react to Koga, a boy who, for once, actually approached her before he knew of her reputation?

*Note: Was originally on Palcy (Kodansha platform for shojo manga), but also is on Magazine Pocket (Kodansha platform for shonen manga.)*

[Alternate official raw](https://palcy.kodansha.co.jp/c/1.html)
description.es-la: Koga decide confessar a garota mais bonita da escola, Meguro. Para sua surpresa, ela concorda em sair com ele. Mas o que o surpreende ainda mais são suas seguintes palavras: "Eu não sou virgem".

altTitles.ja: エロティック×アナボリック

description.en:
Ageki Kyousuke, a fat guy with a big appetite, has always been interested in Mitsukura Itsuha, a girl who doesn't stand out in his class.   
He comes across her alone on the rooftop after school, exposing her erotic body in an extreme swimsuit!  
Kyousuke finds out Itsuha's secret, which is too unexpected to be ……!  
  
[ So in short THICCNESS is great on this one ;) ]
